short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects ppt, pptx, doc, docx, and pdf files on a webpage and adds download & quick view buttons. Developed by Kalpataru Mallick

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet InstaDoc: Your New Best Friend for Instant Document Viewing

Ever find yourself frustrated with the constant need to download files just to take a quick look at their content? I sure have, and that's why I’m excited to introduce InstaDoc—a game-changing Chrome extension that makes viewing documents a breeze. With InstaDoc, you can forget about waiting for downloads and get straight to what matters: seeing your files instantly.

Why You'll Love InstaDoc
Imagine being able to preview all kinds of documents—PPTs, PDFs, Word docs, Excel sheets—right in your browser without ever leaving the page. InstaDoc makes it possible. No more juggling multiple apps or dealing with those annoying downloads. Just one click, and InstaDoc detects the file type and pops up "View" and "Download" buttons right on the page. Simple, right?

A Popup That Just Works
The best part? InstaDoc’s popup window. When you spot a document link, click "View," and voilà—a neat, easy-to-read preview appears. Whether it’s a presentation, a spreadsheet, or a text document, you’ll get a clear view of what’s inside without any fuss. It’s like peeking inside a file before deciding if it’s worth downloading.

No More Guesswork
Ever downloaded a file only to realize it wasn’t what you needed? We’ve all been there. But with InstaDoc, that’s a thing of the past. You can preview documents first, so you only download the files you actually want. It’s a real time-saver and keeps your downloads folder clutter-free.

Fits Right Into Your Browser
InstaDoc blends seamlessly with Chrome, making it a must-have for anyone who deals with documents regularly—whether you're a professional, a student, or just someone who loves staying organized. Plus, it’s super lightweight, so it won’t slow you down.

Here’s What You Get:

    Instantly detects and previews PPT, PDF, Word, and Excel files right in your browser.
    Adds convenient "View" and "Download" buttons next to document links.
    Offers a smooth and simple popup for instant viewing.
    Lets you preview before downloading, saving you time and storage space.
    Lightweight design that doesn’t bog down your browser.

Ready to make your life easier? Give InstaDoc a try and see how much smoother document viewing can be. Download it now and start enjoying a more efficient, hassle-free way to handle your files.
